name: PoF Kill
description:
⚠️ This is a kill run, so you should be have defeated all the bosses before and be comfortable in performing your role ⚠️

**Special jobs:**

🔴  **DPS (Portal)**
*W6:* Place Mesmer Portals and pull at **Qadim**.

🟥 **DPS (Lamp)**
*W6:* Do the first two Lamps alone at **Qadim**.

🔺**DPS (Pylon)**
*W7:* Do a Pylon at **QtP**.

🔻 **DPS (Kiter / Pylon)**
*W6:* Kite on **Qadim**.
*W7:* Do a Pylon at **QtP**.

🩸 **DPS (Epi  / Pylon)**
*W5:* Use Epidemic to kill the Tormented Dead on **SH**.
*W7:* Do a Pylon at **QtP**.

🟡 **DPS (G1 / CC)**
*W5:* Take Green 1 at **Dhuum**.
*W7* Kill the Wisps at **Sabir** and kill the Anomalies at **QtP**.

<:quick_dps:1022999237824352416>  **Quick DPS (Offtank / G3)**
*W5:* Tank on **SH** and **Dhuum**. Do Green 3.
*W6:* Tank at **Twin Largos** and take a Wyvern at **Qadim**.

🤎 **Heal Alac (Push / Kite / G2)**
*W5:* Push Tormented Dead on **SH** and kite the Messengers and take G2 at **Dhuum**.

<:alac_healer:1023021148612595793> **Healmech (Tank)**
*W5:* Tank on **SH**.
*W6:* Tank on **Twin Largos** and **Qadim**.
*W7:* Tank on **Adina** and  **QtP**.

Send me a message if you have any questions!
